name: Search for the Lost Treasure
description:
An introductory point and click where you search for the Lost Treasure, that nobody else seems to believe in.

This was built for the $104 Adventure Game Challenge and was my first attempt at a point and click adventure. So be nice! It is a bit buggy and has work to be done, but please enjoy!

EDIT: Once you are able to start choosing where you want to go, please DO NOT GO BACK TO THE BEDROOM. There is a bug where the exit door doesn't work. It should not be necessary to go back.
